structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Easements, Privileges And Appurtenances Belonging To Granted Estate
law.text: In a conveyance of real estate all rights, easements, privileges and appurtenances belonging to the granted estate shall be included in the conveyance, unless the contrary shall be stated in the deed, and it shall be unnecessary to enumerate or mention them either generally or specifically.
